name: The Death Trials
description:
Prototype of a game for the 2022 GameDev.TV game Jam.  The theme was "Death is only the  Beginning".

You play as an Archaelogist exploring the lost temple of Eternal Life. Legend says this is the location where you can find the Death Skulls relics, and whoever posseses them has the powers of the Underworld. But only the worthy can gather all of them and escape, do you have what it takes to pass the Death Trials?

Controls:

WASD to move around and mouse to look

Spacebar to jump.

The player can be in 3 different states, Human, Zombie or Skeleton. Each have their own moving values and different abillities.  As a Zombie you can press G to transform into a Skeleton (make sure you have enough life, i.e at least 50%). As a Skeleton you can press mouse left click to cast a fire spell.

Press TAB to check inventory and ESC to pause the game.
